TechDef.Description:
(Technological Victory) See !WARNING!, below. Your technocracy is so far ahead technologically that you can place the full power of magic at your disposal, allowing none to challenge your sovereignty.
!WARNING! This uses Spell Victory condition, so it will only work if you have Spell Victory enabled.
